import { makeStyles } from "@mui/styles";
const personalStyle = makeStyles({
  Box: {
    margin: "0",
    padding: "10%",
    height: "700px",
    width: "650px",
    boxShadow: "5px 10px 20px #000",
    display: "flex",
    flexDirection: "column",
    justifyContent: "center",
    borderRadius: "30px",
    userSelect: "none",
    background: "#fff",
    gap: "1rem"
  },
  AboutMeDiv: {
    height: "40%"
  },
  AboutMe: {
    marginTop: "15px",
    width: "95%",
    height: "100%",
    background: "#e0dede",
    justifyContent: "center",
    display: "flex",
    padding: "10px",
    border: "none",
    outline: "none",
    borderRadius: "20px",
    fontSize: "16px",
    resize: "none"
  },
  AvatarWrapper: {
    position: "relative",
    height: "200px",
    width: "200px",
    margin: "50px auto",
    borderRadius: "50%",
    overflow: "hidden",
    boxShadow: "1px 1px 15px -5px black",
    transition: "all .3s ease",
    "&:hover": {
      transform: "scale(1.05)",
      cursor: "pointer"
    }
  },
  ProfilePic: {
    height: "100%",
    width: "100%",
    transition: "all .3s ease",
    "&:after": {
      top: "0",
      left: "0",
      width: "100%",
      height: "100%",
      position: "absolute",
      background: "#ecf0f1"
    }
  },
  UploadButton: {
    position: "absolute",
    top: "0",
    left: "0",
    height: "100%",
    width: "100%"
  },
  CircleUp: {
    position: "absolute",
    fontSize: "234px",
    top: "-17px",
    left: "0",
    textAlign: "center",
    opacity: "0",
    transition: "all .3s ease",
    color: "#34495e"
  }
});
export default personalStyle;

sourcesContent:
import { makeStyles } from "@mui/styles";

const personalStyle = makeStyles({
    Box: {
        margin: "0",
        padding: "10%",
        height: "700px",
        width: "650px",
        boxShadow: "5px 10px 20px #000",
        display: "flex",
        flexDirection: "column",
        justifyContent: "center",
        borderRadius: "30px",
        userSelect: "none",
        background: "#fff",
        gap: "1rem",
    },
    AboutMeDiv: {
        height: "40%",
    },
    AboutMe: {
        marginTop: "15px",
        width: "95%",
        height: "100%",
        background: "#e0dede",
        justifyContent: "center",
        display: "flex",
        padding: "10px",
        border: "none",
        outline: "none",
        borderRadius: "20px",
        fontSize: "16px",
        resize: "none",
    },
    AvatarWrapper: {
        position: "relative",
        height: "200px",
        width: "200px",
        margin: "50px auto",
        borderRadius: "50%",
        overflow: "hidden",
        boxShadow: "1px 1px 15px -5px black",
        transition: "all .3s ease",
        "&:hover": {
            transform: "scale(1.05)",
            cursor: "pointer",
        }
    },
    ProfilePic: {
        height: "100%",
        width: "100%",
        transition: "all .3s ease",
        "&:after": {
            top: "0",
            left: "0",
            width: "100%",
            height: "100%",
            position: "absolute",
            background: "#ecf0f1",
        }
    },
    UploadButton: {
		position: "absolute",
		top: "0", 
        left: "0",
		height: "100%",
		width: "100%",
	},
    CircleUp: {
        position: "absolute",
        fontSize: "234px",
        top: "-17px",
        left: "0",
        textAlign: "center",
        opacity: "0",
        transition: "all .3s ease",
        color: "#34495e",
    }
})

export default personalStyle
